Products.description: Information about the products we offer.

items.name: Aluminum Shoring Frames
items.description: Lightweight and sturdy, designed for safety with horizontal ledgers, inter-bracing options, and supports up to 10,000 pounds/leg.

items.name: Steel Shoring Frames
items.description: High-quality steel tubes, galvanized or painted, supporting loads up to 10,000 lb with a Factor of Safety of 2.5:1.

items.name: Premium Steel Post Shores
items.description: Featuring quick-release pins, continuous outer tubes, and available in various heights. Ideal for long-term use with labor-saving quick release pins.

items.name: Aluminum Beams
items.description: Versatile aluminum beams for shoring and formwork, made from alloy 6351-T6. Reduces weight and minimizes worker strain.

items.name: Screw Jacks
items.description: 48mm hollow steel shaft with quick-locking T-head bolts, compatible with aluminum and timber stringers.

items.name: Wood Beams
items.description: Crafted from premium quality wood, providing excellent strength and durability for scaffolding structures.

categories.Contact: You can reach us at 778 898 5301 or email us at info@ttfscaffolding.com. Our address is 10979 Olsen Rd, Surrey, BC V3V 3S9
categories.Quotation: Our process to give you a quotation is the following: Submit your drawings. Our experts analyze every detail, calculating the required components meticulously to provide an accurate quote.
categories.Prices: Pricing details for TTF SCAFFOLDING rental services. Pricing varies based on product type, rental duration, and project requirements. For accurate pricing, please request a quotation.

About.description: In TTF SCAFFOLDING, we take pride in our extensive expertise in Suspended Slab Shoring Rental and Engineering in Greater Vancouver. Our commitment to excellence and safety sets us apart as a reliable choice for construction professionals.
About.experience: In TTF SCAFFOLDING, With over 8 years of experience, we deliver top-quality equipment and unparalleled service.

Quality Assurance.materials: Utilizing the finest materials sourced from trusted suppliers undergoing quality control assessments.
Quality Assurance.design: Dedicated to innovation, with research and development enhancing functionality, usability, and efficiency.
Quality Assurance.testing: Products undergo rigorous testing to ensure durability and the ability to withstand construction demands.

Slab Scaffolding.description: Temporary support structure for pouring or repairing concrete slabs or beams.
features: Support for wet concrete until it gains strength.
Adjustable to different heights and layouts.
Ensures worker safety and structural integrity.

Process of Slabbing: Formwork Installation: Setting up wood or steel forms.
Reinforcement: Adding steel rebar for strength.
Concrete Pouring: Spreading and leveling fresh concrete.
Finishing: Smoothing the surface with tools.
Curing: Keeping concrete moist for strength.
Removal of Formwork: Taking down forms after curing.

instructions.details: 25 pieces per bundle, two straps, laid on the ground.
100 pieces per pallet, shrink-wrapped with two straps, heads and feet separated.
30 pieces in two rows of 15, same sizes together, two straps.
50 pieces, 5 rows of 10, with 2x4 between rows, two straps.
40 pieces in 5 rows of 8, same size together, two straps.
Bag of 50, tied with steel wire. Bags supplied if needed.
Bag of 100, tied with steel wire or zap strap.
25 pieces per bundle, same sizes together, two straps.

guidelines: All crew must wear harnesses and double lanyards.
Harnesses should attach to horizontal members between the knee brace and frame leg.

categories.Delivery: Our delivery services cover a wide range of locations, including Vancouver, Burnaby, Surrey, Richmond, Langley, Coquitlam, Delta, New Westminster, North Vancouver, West Vancouver, Maple Ridge, Abbotsford, Port Coquitlam, Port Moody, White Rock, Chilliwack, Mission, and Pitt Meadows. Plus, with our fast shipping, you can count on quick and reliable delivery to keep your projects in Vancouver running smoothly. Delivery fees may apply based on location and order size.
